product_name: Columbia River Pazoda Knife and Eat'N Tool Combo Pack
long_description: The Columbia River Pazoda pocket knife and Eat'N Tool combo pack brings together the stylish folding Pazoda pocket knife and the ingenious Eat'N Tool into one package. Pazoda folding knife features a premium stainless-steel blade and frame, both coated with gray titanium nitride. Oval blade hole allows fast opening with either hand. Eat'N Tool looks like the familiar spoon/fork "spork" combination that belies a lightweight, high-tech outdoor tool. Besides the ergonomic spoon and short-tined fork, there's a handy bottle opener on one side and an emergency screwdriver blade on the other. 3 metric wrenches (10mm, 8mm and 6mm) are useful for emergency repairs. Non-weight-bearing carabiner lets you clip the Eat'N Tool to clothing or a pack.
short_description: The Columbia River Pazoda pocket knife and Eat'N Tool combo pack brings together the stylish folding Pazoda pocket knife and the ingenious Eat'N Tool into one package.
